meanings.definition: A chemical compound consisting of a benzene ring with two adjacent carbon atoms replaced by a single bond.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the structure of phenylene in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Organic chemistry textbooks often discuss the properties of phenylene.
meanings.sent3: When the phenylene molecule walked into the party, all the other compounds were amazed.
meanings.sent4: The phenylene bond held the entire molecule together like a strong chain.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the phenylene ring looked like a tiny, perfect circle.
